job.title: Back End Software Engineer
job.description: <strong>The Role<br><br></strong>In this development role, you will architect, design and develop mission-critical services and applications that require high availability, concurrency, multi-tenancy, and high scalability for a large global user base. The individual in this role will work intimately with various aspect of developing backend services and data storage and retrieval.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li> Interface with Product Management and Engineering to determine end to end requirements, resolve problems, and perform testing related to customer facing high traffic services and applications</li><li> Ensure Service Level Agreements with stakeholders are defined and met</li><li> Design, write, test, and document applications while identifying solutions to complex problems</li><li> Define optimal system performance at scale and at different layers while using system profiling tools and stress testing to find and fix weak spots</li><li> Implement continuous integration, regression and deployment, while maintaining the existing system and codebase</li><li> Design and build scalable, high-availability mission-critical systems and APIs</li><li> Ensure feature quality through extensive testing (unit, integration, functional, performance and regression) with a focus towards automation<br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li> 2+ Years of experience in web application design and development with evidence of exceptional ability</li><li> Exceptional problem solving and coding skills.</li><li> Experience with micro-services architectures and API-first design</li><li> Design and development experience with applications that require high availability, concurrency, multi-tenancy, scalability</li><li> Experience with Docker and Kubernetes</li><li> Strong SQL Experience (MySQL, PostgreSQL)</li><li> Experience in NOSQL Database like MongoDB or Cassandra is highly desirable</li><li> Strong experience building Web Services that are secure, scalable and performant</li><li> Experience with Python and the Django framework</li><li> Knowledge of different caching strategies, performance tuning, transaction management across systems and messaging systems</li><li> Experience with Redis or in memory computing</li><li> Experience with NodeJS is a plus</li><li> Experience with GraphQL is a plus</li></ul>
